message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $120 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down to $150, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $150 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $130. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. I'm willing to go down to $140 this time. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $135. Can you meet me at that price?
